_header: Welcome fair lady fairer than Hesperus
Subjects: pageant verses; occasional verse; Arthur, prince of Wales; Catharine of Aragon
_description: Speech of welcome to Princess Catharine at the pageant celebrating her marriage to Prince Arthur — three stanzas rhyme royal

BLCottVitAXVI.First Lines: Welcome faire lady fayrer than HesperusWelcome noble Pryncesse into Bretayne…
BLCottVitAXVI.Last Lines: …Go ye forth to the ioyfull semblaunce nowOf the mariage bitwene your Spouse & you
